A factory for the all objects related to badges.

BadgeFactory

public BadgeFactory()
Method Detail

createBadgeType

public static BadgeType createBadgeType(java.lang.String id,
                                        boolean usedForContainer,
                                        java.lang.String imageUrl,
                                        java.lang.String shortDesc)
Create a badge type

Parameters:
id - the id for a badge type.
usedForContainer - true if the badge type needs to be used at container level.
imageUrl - the URL to the badge type image
shortDesc - text that will appear in the badge SHORTDESC attribute when shown on a container.

createActionableBadge

public static ActionableBadge createActionableBadge(BadgeType type,
                                                    java.lang.String overlayText,
                                                    boolean lightText,
                                                    java.lang.String shortDesc,
                                                    Action action)
Parameters:
type - The type of the badge, used for grouping badges on containers
overlayText - text that will overlay the badge image
lightText - true if badge overlay text should be light colored (false for dark color)
shortDesc - text that will appear in the badge SHORTDESC attribute
action - the action that will be triggered on clicking the badge

createMessageBadge

public static MessageBadge createMessageBadge(BadgeType type,
                                              java.lang.String overlayText,
                                              boolean lightText,
                                              java.lang.String shortDesc,
                                              java.lang.String popupText)
Parameters:
type - The type of the badge, used for grouping badges on containers
overlayText - text that will overlay the badge image
lightText - true if badge overlay text should be light colored (false for dark color)
shortDesc - text that will appear in the badge SHORTDESC attribute
popupText - the message that will pop up when the badge is clicked
